pullrequest.title: Remove plain 'qwt' leaving only 'qwt-qt5', since it links to Qt4 version.

content.raw:
unfortunately `qwt` is used in homebrew on OSX. I think we could tweak this patch and add a platform check to set the name of the qwt library accordingly, e.g.

~~~
diff -r 2e71e0091b49 cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake
--- a/cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake	Fri Jan 20 23:58:49 2017 +0000
+++ b/cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake	Tue Jan 24 15:27:47 2017 -0800
@@ -761,7 +761,12 @@
   PATH_SUFFIXES qwt qwt5
 )
 
-find_library(QWT_LIBRARY NAMES qwt-qt5 qwt PATHS
+SET(QWT_LIB_NAME "qwt-qt5")
+if (APPLE)
+  SET(QWT_LIB_NAME "qwt")
+endif()
+
+find_library(QWT_LIBRARY NAMES ${QWT_LIB_NAME} PATHS
~~~
